projects.name: Goscanner - Port scanner written in Go.
details: Port Scanner for network testing, information gathering.
Design for fast and efficient scanning with goroutines.
Tech Stack: Go, Cobra.

projects.name: MyIP - Terminal UI for network interface monitoring.
details: Terminal UI tool for fetching and displaying IP addresses in a clear, user-friendly format.
Addressed the pain point of confusing ifconfig/ipconfig outputs.
Tech Stack: Rust, Ratatui.

projects.name: Codingtype - Web application for testing your coding speed.
details: Web application for testing coding speed in multiple programming languages syntax.
Tracking the typing speed in real time and calculate the accuracy.
Tech Stack: Svelte.js, TailwindCSS.

projects.name: Valentine Roses - Website for sending a roses card to your loved ones.
details: Web application for sending roses to loved ones on Valentine's Day.
Design for privacy with a password protection to unlock the card.
Tech Stack: Next.js, TailwindCSS, Firebase.
